author: tmiychao
content:
The **EPF Study Group** is here! If you are interested in the study group, join us for a town on Monday and come to ask any questions. The call link will be available here https://eth-protocol-fellows.github.io/protocol-studies/#/eps/week0 

The program is open and permissionless but we would like to know if you are going to participate. Please sign up here https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdLASV5RqAQv6I2KzA6DcxkFHKcZw3YuL3S3uXfsWUiYRsKRg/viewform?usp=send_form
